# Government Tender Announcement

**Tender Title (English):** Valve, Safety Relief
**Tender Title (French):** Soupape de sécurité

**Reference Number:** cb-7333-23875390
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** W8482-241818/A
**Publication Date:** July 19, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** August 28, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST
**Amendment Date:** August 28, 2023

**Procurement Overview:**
The Department of National Defence (DND) invites proposals for the supply of Safety Relief Valves (SRVs) to meet the department's requirements. The delivery locations will be Canadian Forces Bases (CFBs) Esquimalt and Halifax.

**Contract Details:**

* The contracting entity name is Director Maritime Procurement, located at 101 Colonel by Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada.
* The expected contract start date is November 1, 2023, and the end date is March 29, 2024.
* The procurement method is Competitive - Traditional, with a selection criteria of the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Tender Requirements:**

* Seven (7) Safety Relief Valves with Part No. UH22198, NCAGE: 12736 are required for CFB Esquimalt.
* Seven (7) Safety Relief Valves with Part No. UH22198, NCAGE: 12736 are required for CFB Halifax.
* Bidders proposing an Equivalent or Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model, and/or Part Number and NCAGE they are offering.
* Canadian Content: The requirement is subject to a preference for Canadian Goods and Services (CFTA).
* Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.

**Documents and Contact:**
The tender documents are available in both English and French. Interested suppliers can view the documents on [Canada Buy](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7333/rfp-w8482-241818-a-en.pdf). For inquiries or submissions, please contact:

Jean-Pierre Normandin
Email: jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca
Phone: (819) 939-3674

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted
